commands.name: az eventgrid namespace topic-space create
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid namespace topic-space create --name
                                          --namespace-name
                                          --resource-group
                                          [--description]
                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--topic-templates]
examples: az eventgrid namespace topic-space create -g rg --namespace-name name -n topic-space --topic-templates ['name=topicspace']

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace topic-space delete
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid namespace topic-space delete [--ids]
                                          [--name]
                                          [--namespace-name]
                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--resource-group]
                                          [--subscription]
                                          [--yes]
examples: az eventgrid namespace topic-space delete -g rg --namespace-name name -n topic-space

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace topic-space list
commands.summary: List all the topic spaces under a namespace.
examples: az eventgrid namespace topic-space list -g rg --namespace-name name

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace topic-space show
examples: az eventgrid namespace topic-space show  -g rg --namespace-name name -n topic-space

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace topic-space update
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid namespace topic-space update [--add]
                                          [--description]
                                          [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--ids]
                                          [--name]
                                          [--namespace-name]
                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--remove]
                                          [--resource-group]
                                          [--set]
                                          [--subscription]
                                          [--topic-templates]
examples: az eventgrid namespace topic-space update -g rg --namespace-name name -n topic-space --description test

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace topic-space wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
